line.right: / sa eva doṣaḥ / [ p 4 6 | 1 2 4 - 4 6 1 2 5 ] na sa evaṃ prajñapyate / </page><page> kathaṃ tarhi yathendhanamupādāyāgniḥ / </page><page> kathaṃ cendhanamupādāyāgniḥ prajñapyate / </page>

line.left: lakṣaṇabhedāt / </page><page> upādāyārthastu vaktavyaḥ / kathaṃ tadindhanamupādāya so 'gniḥ prajñapyata iti / </page><page> na hi tattasya kāraṇaṃ nāpi tat
line.right: / agnireva hi tatprajñapteḥ kāraṇam / </page><page> yadyāśrayārtha upādāyārthaḥ sahabhāvārtho vā / </page><page> skandhā apyevaṃ pudgalasyāśrayasahabhūtāḥ

line.left: / </page><page> upādāyārthastu vaktavyaḥ / kathaṃ tadindhanamupādāya so 'gniḥ prajñapyata iti / </page><page> na hi tattasya kāraṇaṃ nāpi tat prajñapteḥ / agnireva hi
line.right: kāraṇam / </page><page> yadyāśrayārtha upādāyārthaḥ sahabhāvārtho vā / </page><page> skandhā apyevaṃ pudgalasyāśrayasahabhūtāḥ prāpnuvantīti vispaṣṭamanyatvaṃ

line.left: vaktavyam / </page><page> yadā ca pudgalaḥ prajñapyate ki tāvatskandhānupalabhya prajñapyate āhosvit pudgalam / </page><page> yadi tāvat skandhāṃsteṣveva
line.right: prāpnoti / </page><page> pudgalasyānupalambhāt / </page><page> atha pudgalaṃ kathamasya skandhānupādāya prajñaptirbhavati / </page><page> pudgala eva hi tasyā upādānaṃ prāpnoti / </page>

line.left: pudgalam / </page><page> yadi tāvat skandhāṃsteṣveva pudgalaprajñaptiḥ prāpnoti / </page><page> pudgalasyānupalambhāt / </page><page> atha pudgalaṃ kathamasya skandhānupādāya
line.right: / </page><page> pudgala eva hi tasyā upādānaṃ prāpnoti / </page><page> atha mataṃ satsu skandheṣu pudgala upalabhyate tataḥ skandhānupādāyāsya prajñaptirucyata iti / </page>

line.left: prajñaptirbhavati / </page><page> pudgala eva hi tasyā upādānaṃ prāpnoti / </page><page> atha mataṃ satsu skandheṣu pudgala upalabhyate tataḥ skandhānupādāyāsya
line.right: iti / </page><page> tadevaṃ rūpasyāpi cakṣurmanaskārālokeṣu satsūpalambhāt tānupādāya prajñaptirbaktavyā / </page><page> rūpavacca pudgalasyānyatvaṃ spaṣṭam / </page>

line.left: upalabhyate tataḥ skandhānupādāyāsya prajñaptirucyata iti / </page><page> tadevaṃ rūpasyāpi cakṣurmanaskārālokeṣu satsūpalambhāt tānupādāya
line.right: / </page><page> rūpavacca pudgalasyānyatvaṃ spaṣṭam / </page><page> idaṃ tāvadvaktavyam / </page><page> ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānānāṃ katamena pudgalo vijñeyaḥ / </page><page> ṣaḍbhirapītyucyate / kathaṃ

line.left: tarhyavaktavyaḥ / </page><page> teṣāmapi caivaṃ paśyato " yāvatā bhikṣo cakṣuryāvatā rūpāṇi vistareṇa etāvatā bhikṣo tathāgataḥ sarvaṃ ca prajñāpayati
line.right: ce " ti / </page><page> bimbisārasūtre coktam " ātmā ātmeti bhikṣavo bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ prajñaptimanupatito na tvātrā tmā vā ātmīyaṃ vā

line.left: bhikṣo tathāgataḥ sarvaṃ ca prajñāpayati sarvaprajñaptiṃ ce " ti / </page><page> bimbisārasūtre coktam " ātmā ātmeti bhikṣavo bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ
line.right: na tvātrā tmā vā ātmīyaṃ vā duḥkhamidamutpadya mānamutpadyate " iti vistaraḥ / </page><page> śailayāpyarhantyā māramārabhyoktaṃ / </page><page> " manyase ki nu

line.left: ca nāvocanmābhūt prājñaptikopyasan // </page><page> yatra hi skandhasaṃtāne śubhāśubhaphalāstitā / jīvākhyā tatra sā na syāt jīvanāstitvadeśanāt // </page><page>
line.right: skandhesu jīva ityapināvadat / abhavyaḥ śūnyatāṃ boddhuṃ tadānīṃ tādṛśo janaḥ // </page><page> tathā hyātmāsti nāstīti pṛṣṭo vāstyeva nāvadat /

line.left: sā māyā anyattadvijñānam / vijñānameva bhagavan māyā , māyaiva vijñānam // bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte atraiṣāṃ saṃjñā samajñā
line.right: pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu yaduta bodhisattva iti ? evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - evametadbhagavan , evametatsugata /

line.left: / yatkauśika anirjātaṃ na tatpuṣpam / atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - gambhīraprajño batāyamāryaḥ subhūtiḥ / tāṃ ca nāma
line.right: nirdiśati , tāṃ ca na virodhayati , tāṃ cottānīkaroti , tāmeva copadiśati / atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmataṃ subhūtimetadavocat -

line.left: / evaṃ śāntatvānnopalabhyate / yo 'nupalambhaḥ sarvadharmāṇām , sā prajñāpāramitetyucyate / yadā na bhavati saṃjñā samajñā
line.right: , tadā prajñāpāramitetyucyate // sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - kiyacciracaritāvī sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyo ya iha

line.left: , yatra śuddhaṃ kṛṣṇāguru dhūpyate sma yaduta prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjārtham / tasya ca kūṭāgārasya madhye saptaratnamayaḥ paryaṅkaḥ
line.right: 'bhūt / caturṇāṃ ratnānāṃ peḍā kṛtā , yatra prajñāpāramitā prakṣiptā suvarṇapaṭṭeṣu likhitā vilīnena vaidūryeṇa / tacca kūṭāgāraṃ

line.left: samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ samudānītā // atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaitadabhūt -
line.right: mayā dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmāsanam / ayaṃ ca pṛthivīpradeśaḥ susiktaḥ susaṃmṛṣṭaś ca kṛtaḥ / kuto nu khalvahaṃ

line.left: // atha khalu dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saptānāṃ varṣāṇāmatyayena tataḥ samādhervyutthāya yena dharmāsanaṃ tenopasaṃkramya
line.right: evāsane nyaṣīdat , anekaśatasahasrayā parṣadā parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ deśayāmāsa // </page><page> atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo

line.left: buddhānāñca bhagavatāṃ dharmanairātmyapraveśāya praviṣṭena suviśuddhena ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ nirabhilāpyasvabhāvatāmārabhya
line.right: svabhāvanirvikalpajñeyasamena jñānena yo gocaraviṣayaḥ sāsau paramā tathatā niruttarā jñeyaparyantagatā yasyāḥ sarva

line.left: nābhivartante / tatpunastattvalakṣaṇaṃ vyavasthānataḥ advayaprabhāvitaṃ veditavyam / dvayamucyate bhāvaścābhāvaśca / tatra bhāvo yaḥ
line.right: vyavasthāpitaḥ / tathaiva ca dīrghakālamabhiniviṣṭo lokena / sarvavikalpaprapañcamūlaṃ lokasya / tadyathā rūpamiti vā vedanā saṃjñā

line.left: dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñātaṃ prāptaṃ paryeṣitaṃ manasā 'nuvitarkitamanuvicāritamiti vā / antato yāvannirvāṇamiti vā / ityevaṃbhāgīyaḥ
line.right: svabhāvo dharmāṇāṃ lokasya bhāva ityucyate / </page><page> tatrābhāvo yā asyaiva rūpamiti prajñaptivādasya yāvadantato nirvāṇamiti prajñaptivādasya

line.left: vā / ityevaṃbhāgīyaḥ prajñaptivādanirūḍhaḥ svabhāvo dharmāṇāṃ lokasya bhāva ityucyate / </page><page> tatrābhāvo yā asyaiva rūpamiti
line.right: yāvadantato nirvāṇamiti prajñaptivādasya nirvastukatā nirnimittatā prajñaptivādāśrayasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ nāstikatā asaṃvidyamānatā

line.left: svabhāvo dharmāṇāṃ lokasya bhāva ityucyate / </page><page> tatrābhāvo yā asyaiva rūpamiti prajñaptivādasya yāvadantato nirvāṇamiti
line.right: nirvastukatā nirnimittatā prajñaptivādāśrayasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ nāstikatā asaṃvidyamānatā yāmāśritya prajñaptivādaḥ pravartate /

line.left: bhāva ityucyate / </page><page> tatrābhāvo yā asyaiva rūpamiti prajñaptivādasya yāvadantato nirvāṇamiti prajñaptivādasya nirvastukatā nirnimittatā
line.right: sarveṇa sarvaṃ nāstikatā asaṃvidyamānatā yāmāśritya prajñaptivādaḥ pravartate / ayamucyate 'bhāvaḥ / yatpunaḥ pūrvakeṇa ca bhāvenānena

line.left: nirvāṇamiti prajñaptivādasya nirvastukatā nirnimittatā prajñaptivādāśrayasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ nāstikatā asaṃvidyamānatā yāmāśritya
line.right: pravartate / ayamucyate 'bhāvaḥ / yatpunaḥ pūrvakeṇa ca bhāvenānena cābhāvena ubhābhyāṃ bhāvābhāvābhyāṃ vinirmuktaṃ

line.left: samyakprayogo veditavyaḥ / </page><page> tatra kayā yuktyā nirabhilāpyasvabhāvatā sarvadharmāṇāṃ pratyavagantavyā / yeyaṃ
line.right: yaduta rūpamiti vā vedaneti vā pūrvavadantato yāvannirvāṇamiti vā prajñaptimātrameva tadveditavyam / na svabhāvo nāpi ca

line.left: pratyavagantavyā / yeyaṃ svalakṣaṇaprajñaptirdharmāṇāṃ yaduta rūpamiti vā vedaneti vā pūrvavadantato yāvannirvāṇamiti vā
line.right: tadveditavyam / na svabhāvo nāpi ca tadvinirmuktastadanyo vāggocaro vāgaviṣayaḥ / evaṃ sati na svabhāvo dharmāṇāṃ tathā vidyate

line.left: ekasya dharmasyaikasya vastuno bhaveyuḥ / tat kasya hetoḥ / tathā hyekasmindharme ekasminvastuni bahuvidhā bahavo bahubhirabhilāpaiḥ
line.right: upacārāḥ kriyante / na ca bahuvidhānāñca bahūnāṃ prajñaptivādānāṃ niyamaḥ kaścidupalabhyate / yadanyatamena prajñaptivādenaikena

line.left: tathā hyekasmindharme ekasminvastuni bahuvidhā bahavo bahubhirabhilāpaiḥ prajñaptaya upacārāḥ kriyante / na ca bahuvidhānāñca bahūnāṃ
line.right: niyamaḥ kaścidupalabhyate / yadanyatamena prajñaptivādenaikena tasya dharmasya tasya vastunaḥ tādātmyaṃ tanmayatā tatsvabhāvatā

line.left: prajñaptaya upacārāḥ kriyante / na ca bahuvidhānāñca bahūnāṃ prajñaptivādānāṃ niyamaḥ kaścidupalabhyate / yadanyatamena
line.right: tasya dharmasya tasya vastunaḥ tādātmyaṃ tanmayatā tatsvabhāvatā syānnānyairavaśiṣṭaiḥ prajñaptivādaiḥ / tasmātsakalavikalaiḥ

line.left: / yadanyatamena prajñaptivādenaikena tasya dharmasya tasya vastunaḥ tādātmyaṃ tanmayatā tatsvabhāvatā syānnānyairavaśiṣṭaiḥ
line.right: / tasmātsakalavikalaiḥ sarvaprajñaptivādaiḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvavastūnāṃ nāsti tādātmyaṃ nāsti tanmayatā nāsti tatsvabhāvatā / api ca

line.left: tasya dharmasya tasya vastunaḥ tādātmyaṃ tanmayatā tatsvabhāvatā syānnānyairavaśiṣṭaiḥ prajñaptivādaiḥ / tasmātsakalavikalaiḥ
line.right: sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvavastūnāṃ nāsti tādātmyaṃ nāsti tanmayatā nāsti tatsvabhāvatā / api ca sa cedrūpādayo dharmā yathāpūrvanirdiṣṭāḥ

line.left: sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvavastūnāṃ nāsti tādātmyaṃ nāsti tanmayatā nāsti tatsvabhāvatā / api ca sa cedrūpādayo dharmā yathāpūrvanirdiṣṭāḥ
line.right: bhaveyuḥ / evaṃ sati pūrva tāvadvastu paścāttatra chandataḥ prajñaptivādopacāraḥ / prākprajñaptivādopacārādakṛte

line.left: / api ca sa cedrūpādayo dharmā yathāpūrvanirdiṣṭāḥ prajñaptivādasvabhāvā bhaveyuḥ / evaṃ sati pūrva tāvadvastu paścāttatra chandataḥ
line.right: / prākprajñaptivādopacārādakṛte prajñaptivādopacāre sa dharmastadvastu niḥsvabhāva eva syāt / sati niḥsvabhāvatve nirvastukaḥ

line.left: dharmā yathāpūrvanirdiṣṭāḥ prajñaptivādasvabhāvā bhaveyuḥ / evaṃ sati pūrva tāvadvastu paścāttatra chandataḥ prajñaptivādopacāraḥ /
line.right: prajñaptivādopacāre sa dharmastadvastu niḥsvabhāva eva syāt / sati niḥsvabhāvatve nirvastukaḥ prajñaptivādo na yujyate /

line.left: bhaveyuḥ / evaṃ sati pūrva tāvadvastu paścāttatra chandataḥ prajñaptivādopacāraḥ / prākprajñaptivādopacārādakṛte
line.right: sa dharmastadvastu niḥsvabhāva eva syāt / sati niḥsvabhāvatve nirvastukaḥ prajñaptivādo na yujyate / prajñaptivādopacāre cāsati

line.left: / prākprajñaptivādopacārādakṛte prajñaptivādopacāre sa dharmastadvastu niḥsvabhāva eva syāt / sati niḥsvabhāvatve nirvastukaḥ
line.right: na yujyate / prajñaptivādopacāre cāsati prajñaptivādasvabhāvatā dharmasya vastuno na yujyeta / sa cetpunaḥ pūrvameva

line.left: prajñaptivādopacāre sa dharmastadvastu niḥsvabhāva eva syāt / sati niḥsvabhāvatve nirvastukaḥ prajñaptivādo na yujyate /
line.right: cāsati prajñaptivādasvabhāvatā dharmasya vastuno na yujyeta / sa cetpunaḥ pūrvameva prajñaptivādopacārādakṛte prajñaptivādopacāre sa

line.left: sa dharmastadvastu niḥsvabhāva eva syāt / sati niḥsvabhāvatve nirvastukaḥ prajñaptivādo na yujyate / prajñaptivādopacāre cāsati
line.right: dharmasya vastuno na yujyeta / sa cetpunaḥ pūrvameva prajñaptivādopacārādakṛte prajñaptivādopacāre sa dharmastadvastu tadātmakaṃ syāt

line.left: prajñaptivādo na yujyate / prajñaptivādopacāre cāsati prajñaptivādasvabhāvatā dharmasya vastuno na yujyeta / sa cetpunaḥ pūrvameva
line.right: prajñaptivādopacāre sa dharmastadvastu tadātmakaṃ syāt / evaṃ sati vinā tena rūpamiti prajñaptivādopacāreṇa rūpasaṃjñake dharme

line.left: / prajñaptivādopacāre cāsati prajñaptivādasvabhāvatā dharmasya vastuno na yujyeta / sa cetpunaḥ pūrvameva prajñaptivādopacārādakṛte
line.right: sa dharmastadvastu tadātmakaṃ syāt / evaṃ sati vinā tena rūpamiti prajñaptivādopacāreṇa rūpasaṃjñake dharme rūpasaṃjñake vastuni

line.left: / sa cetpunaḥ pūrvameva prajñaptivādopacārādakṛte prajñaptivādopacāre sa dharmastadvastu tadātmakaṃ syāt / evaṃ sati vinā tena rūpamiti
line.right: rūpasaṃjñake dharme rūpasaṃjñake vastuni rūpabuddhiḥ pravarteta / na ca pravartate / tadanena kāraṇonānayā yuktyā nirabhilāpyaḥ

line.left: yāvannirvāṇaparyantā veditavyāḥ / dvāvimāvasmāddharmavinayātpranaṣṭau veditavyau / yaśca rūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ rūpādikasya vastunaḥ
line.right: svalakṣaṇamasadbhūtasamāropato 'bhiniviśate / yaścāpi prajñaptivādanimittādhiṣṭhānaṃ prajñaptivādanimittasanniśrayaṃ </page>

line.left: / yaśca rūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ rūpādikasya vastunaḥ prajñaptivādasvabhāvaṃ svalakṣaṇamasadbhūtasamāropato 'bhiniviśate / yaścāpi
line.right: prajñaptivādanimittasanniśrayaṃ </page><page> nirabhilāpyātmakatayā paramārthasadbhūtaṃ vastvapadamāno nāśayati sarveṇa sarvaṃ nāstīti /

line.left: vastunaḥ prajñaptivādasvabhāvaṃ svalakṣaṇamasadbhūtasamāropato 'bhiniviśate / yaścāpi prajñaptivādanimittādhiṣṭhānaṃ
line.right: </page><page> nirabhilāpyātmakatayā paramārthasadbhūtaṃ vastvapadamāno nāśayati sarveṇa sarvaṃ nāstīti / asadbhūtasamārope tāvadye doṣāste

line.left: sarvavaināśikaḥ pranaṣṭo bhavatyasmāddharmavinayāt tathā vakṣyāmi rūpādīnāṃ dharmānāṃ vastumātramapavadato naiva tattvaṃ nāpi
line.right: yujyate / tadyathā satsu rūpādiṣu skandheṣu pudgalaprajñaptiryujyate / nāsatsu / nirvastukāpudgalaprajñaptiḥ / evaṃ sati rūpādīnāṃ

line.left: rūpādīnāṃ dharmānāṃ vastumātramapavadato naiva tattvaṃ nāpi prajñaptistadubhayametanna yujyate / tadyathā satsu rūpādiṣu skandheṣu
line.right: / nāsatsu / nirvastukāpudgalaprajñaptiḥ / evaṃ sati rūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vastumātre [ sa ] rūpādidharmaprajñaptivādopacāro yujyate /

line.left: naiva tattvaṃ nāpi prajñaptistadubhayametanna yujyate / tadyathā satsu rūpādiṣu skandheṣu pudgalaprajñaptiryujyate / nāsatsu /
line.right: / evaṃ sati rūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vastumātre [ sa ] rūpādidharmaprajñaptivādopacāro yujyate / nāsati / nirvastukaḥ prajñaptivādopacāraḥ /

line.left: rūpādiṣu skandheṣu pudgalaprajñaptiryujyate / nāsatsu / nirvastukāpudgalaprajñaptiḥ / evaṃ sati rūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vastumātre [ sa ]
line.right: yujyate / nāsati / nirvastukaḥ prajñaptivādopacāraḥ / tatra prajñaptervastu nāstīti niradhiṣṭhānā prajñaptirapi nāsti / ato ya ekatyā

line.left: / evaṃ sati rūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vastumātre [ sa ] rūpādidharmaprajñaptivādopacāro yujyate / nāsati / nirvastukaḥ
line.right: / tatra prajñaptervastu nāstīti niradhiṣṭhānā prajñaptirapi nāsti / ato ya ekatyā durvijñeyān sūtrāntānmahāyānapratisaṃyuktān

line.left: sati rūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vastumātre [ sa ] rūpādidharmaprajñaptivādopacāro yujyate / nāsati / nirvastukaḥ prajñaptivādopacāraḥ / tatra
line.right: nāstīti niradhiṣṭhānā prajñaptirapi nāsti / ato ya ekatyā durvijñeyān sūtrāntānmahāyānapratisaṃyuktān gambhīrān

line.left: ] rūpādidharmaprajñaptivādopacāro yujyate / nāsati / nirvastukaḥ prajñaptivādopacāraḥ / tatra prajñaptervastu nāstīti niradhiṣṭhānā
line.right: nāsti / ato ya ekatyā durvijñeyān sūtrāntānmahāyānapratisaṃyuktān gambhīrān śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktānābhiprāyikārthanirūpitān śrutvā

line.left: śrutvā yathābhūtaṃ bhāṣitasyārthamavijñāyāyoniśo vikalpyāyogavihitena tarkamātrakeṇaivaṃ dṛṣṭayo bhavantyevaṃvādinaḥ /
line.right: sarvametacca tattvam / yaścaivaṃ paśyati sa samyak paśyatīti / teṣāṃ prajñaptyadhiṣṭhānasya vastumātrasyābhāvātsaiva prajñaptiḥ

line.left: dṛṣṭayo bhavantyevaṃvādinaḥ / prajñaptimātrameva sarvametacca tattvam / yaścaivaṃ paśyati sa samyak paśyatīti / teṣāṃ
line.right: vastumātrasyābhāvātsaiva prajñaptiḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhavati / kutaḥ punaḥ prajñaptimātraṃ tattvaṃ bhaviṣyatīti / tadanena paryāyeṇa

line.left: sarvametacca tattvam / yaścaivaṃ paśyati sa samyak paśyatīti / teṣāṃ prajñaptyadhiṣṭhānasya vastumātrasyābhāvātsaiva
line.right: sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhavati / kutaḥ punaḥ prajñaptimātraṃ tattvaṃ bhaviṣyatīti / tadanena paryāyeṇa taistattvamapi prajñaptirapi

line.left: paśyati sa samyak paśyatīti / teṣāṃ prajñaptyadhiṣṭhānasya vastumātrasyābhāvātsaiva prajñaptiḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhavati / kutaḥ punaḥ
line.right: tattvaṃ bhaviṣyatīti / tadanena paryāyeṇa taistattvamapi prajñaptirapi tadubhayamapyapavāditaṃ bhavati / prajñaptitattvāpavādācca

line.left: prajñaptiḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhavati / kutaḥ punaḥ prajñaptimātraṃ tattvaṃ bhaviṣyatīti / tadanena paryāyeṇa taistattvamapi
line.right: tadubhayamapyapavāditaṃ bhavati / prajñaptitattvāpavādācca pradhāno nāstiko veditavyaḥ / sa evaṃ nāṣṭikaḥ sannakathyo

line.left: kutaḥ punaḥ prajñaptimātraṃ tattvaṃ bhaviṣyatīti / tadanena paryāyeṇa taistattvamapi prajñaptirapi tadubhayamapyapavāditaṃ bhavati /
line.right: pradhāno nāstiko veditavyaḥ / sa evaṃ nāṣṭikaḥ sannakathyo bhavatyasaṃvāsyo bhavati vijñānāṃ sabrahmacāriṇām / sa ātmānamapi vipādayati

line.left: yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti / iyamucyate śūnyatāvakrāntiryathābhūtā aviparītā / tadyathā rūpādisaṃjñake yathā nirdiṣṭe vastuni
line.right: dharmo nāsti / atastadrūpādisaṃjñakaṃ vastu tena rūpamityevamādiprajñaptivādātmanā śūnyam / kiṃ punastatra rūpādisaṃjñake

line.left: / tadyathā rūpādisaṃjñake yathā nirdiṣṭe vastuni rūpamityevamādiprajñaptivādātmako dharmo nāsti / atastadrūpādisaṃjñakaṃ vastu tena
line.right: śūnyam / kiṃ punastatra rūpādisaṃjñake vastunayavaśiṣṭam / yaduta tadeva rūpamityevamādiprajñaptivādāśrayaḥ / taccobhayaṃ

line.left: vastu tena rūpamityevamādiprajñaptivādātmanā śūnyam / kiṃ punastatra rūpādisaṃjñake vastunayavaśiṣṭam / yaduta tadeva
line.right: / taccobhayaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti yaduta vastamātrañca vidyamānaṃ vastamātre ca prajñaptimātraṃ ca cāsadbhūtaṃ samāropayati / na

line.left: / yaduta tadeva rūpamityevamādiprajñaptivādāśrayaḥ / taccobhayaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti yaduta vastamātrañca vidyamānaṃ vastamātre ca
line.right: ca cāsadbhūtaṃ samāropayati / na bhūtamapavadate nādhikaṃ karoti na nyūnīkaroti notkṣipati na pratikṣipati / yathābhūtañca tathatāṃ

line.left: upādadīta dṛṣṭaśrute kāntimasaṃprakurvan / kathamiyaṃ gāthā etamevārthaṃ paridīpayati / rūpādisaṃjñake vastuni yā rūpamityevamādyāḥ
line.right: / tāḥ saṃvṛtaya ityucyante / tābhiḥ prajñaptibhistasya vastunastādātmyamityevaṃ nopaiti tāḥ saṃvṛtīḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ /

line.left: gāthā etamevārthaṃ paridīpayati / rūpādisaṃjñake vastuni yā rūpamityevamādyāḥ prajñaptayaḥ / tāḥ saṃvṛtaya ityucyante / tābhiḥ
line.right: vastunastādātmyamityevaṃ nopaiti tāḥ saṃvṛtīḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ / samāropāpavādikā dṛṣṭirasya nāsti / ato 'sau tasyā

line.left: niśritya dhyāyasi // iti / kathañca punaretatsūtrapadametamevārthaṃ paridīpayati pṛthivyādisaṃjñake vastuni yā pṛthivītyevamādikā
line.right: sā pṛthivyādisaṃjñetyucyate / sā punaḥ saṃjñā pṛthivyādisaṃjñake vastuni samāropikā cāpavādikā ca / tanmayasvabhāvavastugrāhikā

line.left: / catasṛbhiḥ paryeṣaṇābhiḥ caturvidhena ca yathābhūtaparijñānena / catasraḥ paryeṣaṇāḥ katamāḥ / nāmaparyeṣaṇā / vastuparyeṣaṇā /
line.right: ca / viśeṣaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇā ca / tatra nāmaparyeṣaṇā yadvodhisattvo nāmni nāmamātraṃ paśyati / evaṃ vastuni vastumātradarśanaṃ [ vastu

line.left: caturvidhena ca yathābhūtaparijñānena / catasraḥ paryeṣaṇāḥ katamāḥ / nāmaparyeṣaṇā / vastuparyeṣaṇā / svabhāvaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇā ca /
line.right: ca / tatra nāmaparyeṣaṇā yadvodhisattvo nāmni nāmamātraṃ paśyati / evaṃ vastuni vastumātradarśanaṃ [ vastu ] paryeṣaṇā /

line.left: ca / tatra nāmaparyeṣaṇā yadvodhisattvo nāmni nāmamātraṃ paśyati / evaṃ vastuni vastumātradarśanaṃ [ vastu ] paryeṣaṇā /
line.right: svabhāvaprajñaptimātradarśanaṃ svabhāvaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇā / viśeṣaprajñaptau viśeṣaprajñaptimātradarśanaṃ

line.left: / tatra nāmaparyeṣaṇā yadvodhisattvo nāmni nāmamātraṃ paśyati / evaṃ vastuni vastumātradarśanaṃ [ vastu ] paryeṣaṇā / svabhāvaprajñaptau
line.right: svabhāvaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇā / viśeṣaprajñaptau viśeṣaprajñaptimātradarśanaṃ viśeṣaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇā / sa nāmavastuno bhinnañca

line.left: nāmni nāmamātraṃ paśyati / evaṃ vastuni vastumātradarśanaṃ [ vastu ] paryeṣaṇā / svabhāvaprajñaptau svabhāvaprajñaptimātradarśanaṃ
line.right: / viśeṣaprajñaptau viśeṣaprajñaptimātradarśanaṃ viśeṣaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇā / sa nāmavastuno bhinnañca lakṣaṇaṃ paśyatyanuśliṣṭañca /

line.left: vastuni vastumātradarśanaṃ [ vastu ] paryeṣaṇā / svabhāvaprajñaptau svabhāvaprajñaptimātradarśanaṃ svabhāvaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇā /
line.right: viśeṣaprajñaptimātradarśanaṃ viśeṣaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇā / sa nāmavastuno bhinnañca lakṣaṇaṃ paśyatyanuśliṣṭañca /

line.left: [ vastu ] paryeṣaṇā / svabhāvaprajñaptau svabhāvaprajñaptimātradarśanaṃ svabhāvaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇā / viśeṣaprajñaptau
line.right: viśeṣaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇā / sa nāmavastuno bhinnañca lakṣaṇaṃ paśyatyanuśliṣṭañca / nāmavastvanuśleṣasanniśritāṃ ca

line.left: / svabhāvaprajñaptau svabhāvaprajñaptimātradarśanaṃ svabhāvaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇā / viśeṣaprajñaptau viśeṣaprajñaptimātradarśanaṃ
line.right: / sa nāmavastuno bhinnañca lakṣaṇaṃ paśyatyanuśliṣṭañca / nāmavastvanuśleṣasanniśritāṃ ca svabhāvaprajñapti viśeṣaprajñaptiñca [

line.left: viśeṣaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇā / sa nāmavastuno bhinnañca lakṣaṇaṃ paśyatyanuśliṣṭañca / nāmavastvanuśleṣasanniśritāṃ ca
line.right: viśeṣaprajñaptiñca [ prati ] vidhyati / catvāri yathābhūtaparijñānāni katamāni / nāmaiṣaṇāgataṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ vastveṣaṇāgataṃ

line.left: / sa nāmavastuno bhinnañca lakṣaṇaṃ paśyatyanuśliṣṭañca / nāmavastvanuśleṣasanniśritāṃ ca svabhāvaprajñapti
line.right: [ prati ] vidhyati / catvāri yathābhūtaparijñānāni katamāni / nāmaiṣaṇāgataṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ vastveṣaṇāgataṃ

line.left: viśeṣaprajñaptiñca [ prati ] vidhyati / catvāri yathābhūtaparijñānāni katamāni / nāmaiṣaṇāgataṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ vastveṣaṇāgataṃ
line.right: viśeṣaprajñaptyeṣaṇāgatañca yathābhūtaparijñānam / nāmaiṣaṇāgataṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ katamat / sa khalu bodhisattvo nāmni

line.left: / catvāri yathābhūtaparijñānāni katamāni / nāmaiṣaṇāgataṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ vastveṣaṇāgataṃ svabhāvaprajñaptyeṣaṇāgataṃ
line.right: yathābhūtaparijñānam / nāmaiṣaṇāgataṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ katamat / sa khalu bodhisattvo nāmni nāmamātratāṃ paryeṣya tannāmaivaṃ

line.left: sarvābhilāpaviśliṣṭaṃ nirabhilāpyaṃ tadrūpādisaṃjñakaṃ vastu paśyati / idaṃ dvitīyaṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ vastveṣaṇāgatam /
line.right: yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ katamat yataśca bodhisattvaḥ rūpādisaṃjñake vastuni svabhāvaprajñaptau prajñaptimātratāṃ paryeṣya tathā

line.left: vastveṣaṇāgatam / svabhāvaprajñaptyeṣaṇāgataṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ katamat yataśca bodhisattvaḥ rūpādisaṃjñake vastuni
line.right: prajñaptimātratāṃ paryeṣya tathā svabhāvaprajñaptyā atatsvabhāvasya vastunaḥ tatsvabhāvābhāsatāṃ yathābhūtaṃ pratividhyati

line.left: / svabhāvaprajñaptyeṣaṇāgataṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ katamat yataśca bodhisattvaḥ rūpādisaṃjñake vastuni svabhāvaprajñaptau
line.right: paryeṣya tathā svabhāvaprajñaptyā atatsvabhāvasya vastunaḥ tatsvabhāvābhāsatāṃ yathābhūtaṃ pratividhyati prajānāti / tasya

line.left: yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ katamat yataśca bodhisattvaḥ rūpādisaṃjñake vastuni svabhāvaprajñaptau prajñaptimātratāṃ paryeṣya tathā
line.right: atatsvabhāvasya vastunaḥ tatsvabhāvābhāsatāṃ yathābhūtaṃ pratividhyati prajānāti / tasya

line.left: tatsvabhāvaṃ paśyataḥ tadābhāsamatanmayam idṃ tṛtīyaṃ yathābhūtaṃ parijñānaṃ sugambhīrārthagocaram /
line.right: yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ katamat / yataśca bodhisattvo viśeṣaprajñaptau prajñaptimātratāṃ paryeṣya tasmin rūpādisaṃjñake vastuni

line.left: yathābhūtaṃ parijñānaṃ sugambhīrārthagocaram / viśeṣaprajñaptyeṣaṇāgataṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ katamat / yataśca bodhisattvo
line.right: prajñaptimātratāṃ paryeṣya tasmin rūpādisaṃjñake vastuni viśeṣaprajñaptimadvayārthena paśyati / na tadvastu bhāvo nābhāvaḥ /

line.left: parijñānaṃ sugambhīrārthagocaram / viśeṣaprajñaptyeṣaṇāgataṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ katamat / yataśca bodhisattvo viśeṣaprajñaptau
line.right: paryeṣya tasmin rūpādisaṃjñake vastuni viśeṣaprajñaptimadvayārthena paśyati / na tadvastu bhāvo nābhāvaḥ / abhilāpyenātmanā

line.left: yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ katamat / yataśca bodhisattvo viśeṣaprajñaptau prajñaptimātratāṃ paryeṣya tasmin rūpādisaṃjñake vastuni
line.right: paśyati / na tadvastu bhāvo nābhāvaḥ / abhilāpyenātmanā 'pariniṣpannatvānna bhāvaḥ / na punarabhāvo nirabhilāpyenātmanā

line.left: / nārūpī saṃvṛtisatyena tatra rūpopacāratayā / yathā bhāvaścābhāvaśca rūpī cārūpī ca / tathā sanidarśanānidarśanādayo
line.right: sarve 'nena nayenaivaṃ veditavyāḥ / iti yadetāṃ viśeṣaprajñaptimevamadvayārthena yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti / idamucyate

line.left: rūpī cārūpī ca / tathā sanidarśanānidarśanādayo viśeṣaprajñaptiparyāyāḥ sarve 'nena nayenaivaṃ veditavyāḥ / iti yadetāṃ
line.right: yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti / idamucyate viśeṣaprajñaptyeṣaṇāgataṃ yathābhūtaparijñānam / tatra yo 'sāvaṣṭavidho mithyāvikalpo bālānāṃ

line.left: sarve 'nena nayenaivaṃ veditavyāḥ / iti yadetāṃ viśeṣaprajñaptimevamadvayārthena yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti / idamucyate
line.right: yathābhūtaparijñānam / tatra yo 'sāvaṣṭavidho mithyāvikalpo bālānāṃ trivastujanako lokanirvartakaḥ so 'sya caturvidhasya

line.left: yathābhūtaṃ śāntato manasi kurvato yā cittasthitiḥ / ayamasyocyate animittaḥ samādhiḥ / kasmātpunareṣāmeva trayāṇāṃ samādhīnāṃ
line.right: / nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ dvayamidaṃ saccāsacca / tatra saṃskṛtamasaskṛtañca sat asadātmā vātmīyaṃ vā / tatraḥ </page><page> saṃskṛte

line.left: utpadyate nirudhyate ceti na yujyate / na ca punaḥ kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā sarvakālāstitāñca dravyasatāṃ svabhāvapariniṣpatiñca
line.right: satāṃ paśyato nirvidvirāgo vimuktiśca yujyate / ato viparyayeṇa tu yujyate / ityebhirākārairbodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃskārā anityā iti

line.left: bodhisattvasya pañcamaṃ sātatyakaraṇīyam / daśeme dharmā bodhisattvānāṃ pradhānasammatā yān bodhisattvā agrato
line.right: ca prajñapayanti / katame daśa / bodhisattvagotraṃ sarvagotrāṇāṃ pradhānam / prathamaścittotpādaḥ sarvasamyak praṇidhānānaṃ pradhānam

line.left: / sarvasamāpattīnāṃ </page><page> nirodhasamāpattiḥ pradhānam / sarvopāyakauśalyānāṃ viśuddhamupāyakauśalyaṃ yathānirdiṣṭaṃ pradhānam / uddānam /
line.right: syādvyavasthānaṃ dharmāṇāmeṣaṇā tathā / yathābhūtaparijñānamaprameyāstathaiva ca // deśanāyāḥ phalaṃ caiva mahattvaṃ yānasaṃgrahaḥ /

line.left: tathā / yathābhūtaparijñānamaprameyāstathaiva ca // deśanāyāḥ phalaṃ caiva mahattvaṃ yānasaṃgrahaḥ / bodhisattvā daśa jñeyā
line.right: // catvārīmāni bodhisattvānāṃ prajñaptivyavasthānāni yāniṃ bodhisattvā eva samyak prajñapayanti vyavasthāpayanti tathāgatā vā / na

line.left: ca // deśanāyāḥ phalaṃ caiva mahattvaṃ yānasaṃgrahaḥ / bodhisattvā daśa jñeyā nāmaprajñaptayastathā // catvārīmāni bodhisattvānāṃ
line.right: yāniṃ bodhisattvā eva samyak prajñapayanti vyavasthāpayanti tathāgatā vā / na tvanyaḥ kaściddevabhūto vā manuṣyabhūto vā

line.left: tathāgatā vā / na tvanyaḥ kaściddevabhūto vā manuṣyabhūto vā śramaṇabrāhmaṇabhūto vānyatraitebhya evaṃ śrutvā / katamāni catvāri /
line.right: satyaprajñaptivyavattthānaṃ yuktiprajñaptivyavasthānaṃ yānaprajñaptivyavasthānañca / tatra yā dvādaśāṅgasya sūtrādikasya

line.left: kaściddevabhūto vā manuṣyabhūto vā śramaṇabrāhmaṇabhūto vānyatraitebhya evaṃ śrutvā / katamāni catvāri / dharmaprajñaptivyavasthānaṃ
line.right: yuktiprajñaptivyavasthānaṃ yānaprajñaptivyavasthānañca / tatra yā dvādaśāṅgasya sūtrādikasya vacogatasyānupūrvaracanā

line.left: vā śramaṇabrāhmaṇabhūto vānyatraitebhya evaṃ śrutvā / katamāni catvāri / dharmaprajñaptivyavasthānaṃ satyaprajñaptivyavattthānaṃ
line.right: yānaprajñaptivyavasthānañca / tatra yā dvādaśāṅgasya sūtrādikasya vacogatasyānupūrvaracanā anupūrvavyavasthānasamāyogaḥ /

line.left: evaṃ śrutvā / katamāni catvāri / dharmaprajñaptivyavasthānaṃ satyaprajñaptivyavattthānaṃ yuktiprajñaptivyavasthānaṃ
line.right: / tatra yā dvādaśāṅgasya sūtrādikasya vacogatasyānupūrvaracanā anupūrvavyavasthānasamāyogaḥ / idamucyate

line.left: / tatra yā dvādaśāṅgasya sūtrādikasya vacogatasyānupūrvaracanā anupūrvavyavasthānasamāyogaḥ / idamucyate
line.right: / satyaprajñaptivyavasthānaṃ punaranekavidham / avitathārthena tāvadekameva satyaṃ na dvitīyamasti / dvividhaṃ satyam / saṃvṛtisatyaṃ

line.left: yā dvādaśāṅgasya sūtrādikasya vacogatasyānupūrvaracanā anupūrvavyavasthānasamāyogaḥ / idamucyate dharmaprajñaptivyavasthānam /
line.right: punaranekavidham / avitathārthena tāvadekameva satyaṃ na dvitīyamasti / dvividhaṃ satyam / saṃvṛtisatyaṃ paramārthasatyaṃ ca /

line.left: kleśasatyaṃ tathā śravaṇayoniśomanaskārasatyaṃ samyakdṛṣṭisatyaṃ samyagdṛṣṭiphalasatyaṃ ceti / idamucyate bodhisattvānāṃ
line.right: / prabhedaśaḥ punaretadapramāṇa veditavyam / catasro yuktayo yuktiprajñaptivyavasthānamityucyate / tāsāṃ punaḥ pravibhāgaḥ

line.left: ceti / idamucyate bodhisattvānāṃ satyaprajñaptivyavasthānam / prabhedaśaḥ punaretadapramāṇa veditavyam / catasro yuktayo
line.right: / tāsāṃ punaḥ pravibhāgaḥ pūrvavadveditavyaḥ / trayāṇāṃ yānānāṃ ekaikasya saptabhirākāraiḥ prajñaptivyavasthānam / śrāvakayānasya

line.left: yuktiprajñaptivyavasthānamityucyate / tāsāṃ punaḥ pravibhāgaḥ pūrvavadveditavyaḥ / trayāṇāṃ yānānāṃ ekaikasya saptabhirākāraiḥ
line.right: / śrāvakayānasya pratyekabuddhayānasya mahāyānasya yānaprajñaptivyavasthānamityucyate / caturṣvāryasatyeṣu yā prajñā tasyā eva ca

line.left: / trayāṇāṃ yānānāṃ ekaikasya saptabhirākāraiḥ prajñaptivyavasthānam / śrāvakayānasya pratyekabuddhayānasya mahāyānasya
line.right: / caturṣvāryasatyeṣu yā prajñā tasyā eva ca prajñāyā ya āśrayaḥ ālambanaṃ sahāyaḥ karma saṃbhārastasyā eva ca prajñāyā yat phalam ebhiḥ

line.left: yā prajñā tasyā eva ca prajñāyā ya āśrayaḥ ālambanaṃ sahāyaḥ karma saṃbhārastasyā eva ca prajñāyā yat phalam ebhiḥ saptabhirākāraiḥ
line.right: sākalyena veditavyam / yathā śrāvakayānamevaṃ pratyekabuddhayānaprajñaptivyavasthānam / nirabhilāpyaṃ vastvālambanīkṛtya

line.left: eva ca prajñāyā yat phalam ebhiḥ saptabhirākāraiḥ śrāvakayānaprajñaptivyavasthānaṃ sākalyena veditavyam / yathā śrāvakayānamevaṃ
line.right: / nirabhilāpyaṃ vastvālambanīkṛtya sarvadharmeṣu yā tathatā nirvikalpasamatā niryāṇatā prajñā tasyā eva ca prajñāyā ya āśraya ālambanaṃ

line.left: niryāṇatā prajñā tasyā eva ca prajñāyā ya āśraya ālambanaṃ sahāyaḥ karma sambhārastasyā eva ca prajñāyā yatphalam / ityebhiḥ
line.right: veditavyam / atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣvadhvaṣu ye kecidbodhisattvāḥ samyakprajñaptivyavasthānaṃ kṛtavantaḥ kariṣyanti kurvanti vā

line.left: / ityebhiḥ saptabhirākārairmahāyānaprajñaptivyavasthānaṃ veditavyam / atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣvadhvaṣu ye kecidbodhisattvāḥ
line.right: kṛtavantaḥ kariṣyanti kurvanti vā punaḥ sarve ta ebhiścatubhirvastubhiḥ / nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ / catvārīmāni bodhisattvānāṃ

line.left: bodhisattvānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ yathābhūtaparijñāyai paryeṣaṇāvastūni / katamāni catvāri / nāmaparyeṣaṇā / vastuparyeṣaṇā /
line.right: / viśeṣaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇā ca / eṣāṃ ca vibhāgaḥ pūrvavadveditavyaḥ tadyathā tattvārthapaṭale / </page><page> catvārīmāni bodhisattvānāṃ

line.left: yathābhūtaparijñāyai paryeṣaṇāvastūni / katamāni catvāri / nāmaparyeṣaṇā / vastuparyeṣaṇā / svabhāvaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇā /
line.right: ca / eṣāṃ ca vibhāgaḥ pūrvavadveditavyaḥ tadyathā tattvārthapaṭale / </page><page> catvārīmāni bodhisattvānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ yathābhūtaparijñānāni

line.left: sarvadharmāṇāṃ yathābhūtaparijñānāni / katamāni catvāri / nāmaparyeṣaṇāgataṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ vastuparyeṣaṇāgataṃ
line.right: viśeṣaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇāgataṃ yathābhūtaparijñānam / eṣāmapi vibhāgaḥ pūrvavadveditavyaḥ / [ tadyathā tattvārthapaṭale / ] / pañceme

line.left: / katamāni catvāri / nāmaparyeṣaṇāgataṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ vastuparyeṣaṇāgataṃ svabhāvaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇāgataṃ
line.right: yathābhūtaparijñānam / eṣāmapi vibhāgaḥ pūrvavadveditavyaḥ / [ tadyathā tattvārthapaṭale / ] / pañceme aprameyā bodhisattvānāṃ

line.left: samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante arthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇām / tatra ye kecidbhagavatā bodhisattvānāmadhyāśayā ākhyātāḥ
line.right: prakāśitāsteṣu teṣvadhikaraṇeṣu teṣāṃ sarveṣāmebhireva pañcadaśabhiradhyāśayaiḥ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ /

line.left: tadanyaiḥ punastadanyeṣām / evaṃ pāraṃparyeṇa brahmā preritaṃ sarvasattvanikāye bhramati / tasmād brāhmañcakramitucyate /
line.right: niruttaraśāstṛsaṃpatparigṛhītasya cātmano vikhyāpanāt tanmārgadeśanayā ca sarvatadanyapāṣaṇḍapratikṣepaṇāt

line.left: / samāsatastvātmahita-pratipattisampat-parahita- [ pratipatti- ] sva parahitapratipattisampadaścāsādhāraṇam / teṣām uttānā vivṛtā
line.right: prakāśitā bhavati / aparaḥ samāsārthaparyāyaḥ / prāptavyantaprāptyabhyupāyaḥ / tasya cābhyupāyasya sarvajanyatāyo [ yaḥ ]

line.left: śrāvakāṇāṃ teṣu teṣvavatāramukheṣvavavādamanuprayacchanti tathāśrāvakabhūmau sarveṇa sarvaṃ nirantaramākhyātamuttānaṃ vivṛtaṃ
line.right: prakāśitam / kathañca punastathāgatā bodhisattvamādikarmikaṃ tatprathamakarmikaṃ samādhisambhāraparigrahe

line.left: kaścitṣaḍāyatanavinirmukto dharmaḥ svabhāvena pariniṣpannaḥ adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā ubhayamantareṇa vā vidyate / yatredaṃ nāma </page><page> saṃjñā
line.right: upacāraḥ pravartate sa tvamevaṃ yoniśo manasikurvaṃstaṃ dharmaṃ nopalapsyase / nānyatra te evaṃ bhaviṣyati / āgantukeṣveṣu

line.left: / yadā ca te kulaputra tasmin svanāmni āgantukasaṃjñā utpānna bhavati pratilabdhā sa tvaṃ yā te cakṣuṣi cakṣurnāma cakṣuḥsaṃjñā
line.right: yoniśomanasikuru / evañca punarmanasikuru / asmiñcakṣuṣi dvayamupalabhyate / idaṃ ca nāma saṃjñā prajñaptiścakṣuriti / etacca

line.left: cakṣuḥ-prajñaptistāmadhyātmaṃ yoniśomanasikuru / evañca punarmanasikuru / asmiñcakṣuṣi dvayamupalabhyate / idaṃ ca nāma saṃjñā
line.right: / etacca vastumātram / yatredaṃ nāma saṃjñā prajñaptiḥ / nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ / tatra yaccakṣuṣi nāma saṃjñā prajñaptistattāvanna cakṣuḥ

line.left: punarmanasikuru / asmiñcakṣuṣi dvayamupalabhyate / idaṃ ca nāma saṃjñā prajñaptiścakṣuriti / etacca vastumātram / yatredaṃ nāma saṃjñā
line.right: / nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ / tatra yaccakṣuṣi nāma saṃjñā prajñaptistattāvanna cakṣuḥ / yadapi tadvastu yatra cakṣuḥsaṃjñā tadapi

line.left: saṃjñā prajñaptiścakṣuriti / etacca vastumātram / yatredaṃ nāma saṃjñā prajñaptiḥ / nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ / tatra yaccakṣuṣi nāma saṃjñā
line.right: cakṣuḥ / yadapi tadvastu yatra cakṣuḥsaṃjñā tadapi svabhāvato na cakṣuḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ / na hi tatra cakṣurnāma cakṣuḥsaṃjñāṃ

line.left: cakṣuḥ / yadapi tadvastu yatra cakṣuḥsaṃjñā tadapi svabhāvato na cakṣuḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ / na hi tatra cakṣurnāma cakṣuḥsaṃjñāṃ
line.right: vinā kasyacit cakṣurbuddhiḥ pravartate / sa cedetadvastu tenātmanā pariniṣpannaṃ syāt / yena nāmnā 'bhilapyate na tatra punastadapekṣā

line.left: tasmin vastuni cakṣuriti buddhiḥ pravartate / na ca punaḥ pravartamānā upalabhyate tasmādidamapi cakṣurnāma cakṣuḥsaṃjñā
line.right: āgantuke dharme saṃjñā āgantukī / evaṃ te 'dhyātmametaccakṣuryoniśo manasikurvataścakṣuḥsaṃjñāyāmapyāgantukasaṃjñā utpannā

line.left: tasya samāsato yāvān puṇyaskandho bhagavatā sarvabodhisattvapiṭake saṃgṛhītasya sūtrāntasya śravaṇādikarmaṇa ākhyāta uttāno vivṛtaḥ
line.right: prakāśitaḥ tāvānasya puṇyaskandhaḥ pratyāśaṃsitavyaḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ / tathā hyasyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sarvasya

line.left: 'māyāvī buddhadharmasaṃghaniyatāśayaḥ / sa imān daśa kuśalān karmapathān satatasamitamanurakṣan evaṃ cittāśayamabhinirharati - yā
line.right: sarvā sā eṣāṃ daśānāmakuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ samādānahetoḥ / hanta ahamātmanaiva samyakpratipattisthitaḥ parān samyakpratipattau

line.left: dharmapratisaṃvidā abhāvaśarīraṃ dharmāṇāṃ prajānāti / arthapratisaṃvidā udayāstagamanaṃ dharmāṇāṃ prajānāti / niruktipratisaṃvidā
line.right: deśayati / pratibhānapratisaṃvidā yathāprajñaptyavikopanatāparyantatayā dharmaṃ deśayati // punaraparaṃ dharmapratisaṃvidā

line.left: udayāstagamanaṃ dharmāṇāṃ prajānāti / niruktipratisaṃvidā sarvadharmaprajñaptyacchedanadharmaṃ deśayati / pratibhānapratisaṃvidā
line.right: dharmaṃ deśayati // punaraparaṃ dharmapratisaṃvidā pratyutpannavibhaktiṃ dharmāṇāṃ prajānāti / arthapratisaṃvidā

line.right: gandhadhūpamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvastrābharaṇamaṇiratnaprajñaptirvā , tato 'tiriktatarāḥ

line.right: hyātmā dravyasanna hi vidyate / skandhānāṃ skandhatā tadvatprajñaptyā na tu dravyataḥ // Lank_ 3 . 2 7 // caturvidhā vai samatā lakṣaṇaṃ

line.right: na tu dravyataḥ // Lank_ 3 . 2 7 // caturvidhā vai samatā lakṣaṇaṃ hetubhāvajam / nairātmyasamatā caiva caturthaṃ yogayoginām // Lank_ 3 . 2 8 //

line.right: nāsti vastusvabhāvataḥ / prajñaptivastubhāvena kalpayiṣyanti tārkikāḥ // Lank_ 3 . 5 2 // nimittaṃ vastu vijñaptiṃ manovispanditaṃ ca tat /

line.right: kalpayiṣyanti tārkikāḥ // Lank_ 3 . 5 2 // nimittaṃ vastu vijñaptiṃ manovispanditaṃ ca tat / atikramya tu putrā me nirvikalpāścaranti te //

line.left: / tattvaṃ bhūtaṃ niścato niṣṭhā prakṛtiḥ svabhāvo 'nupalabdhistattathālakṣaṇam / mayā anyaiśca tathāgatairanugamya yathāvaddeśitaṃ
line.right: vivṛtamuttānīkṛtam , yatrānugamya samyagavabodhānucchedāśāśvatato vikalpasyāpravṛttiḥ svapratyātmāryajñānānukūlaṃ

line.right: kalpayiṣyanti tārkikāḥ // Lank_ 1 0 . 8 6 // bhāvasvabhāvajijñāsā na hi bhrāntirnivāryate / bhāvasvabhāvānutpattirevaṃ dṛṣṭvā vimucyate //

line.left: vijñānaṃ na pravartate / tadā manomayaṃ kāyaṃ labhate buddhabhūmi ca // Lank_ 1 0 . 22 6 // pratyayā dhātavaḥ skandhā dharmāṇāṃ ca svalakṣaṇam /

line.left: // Lank_ 1 0 . 4 7 9 // </page><page> mātrāsvabhāvasaṃsthānaṃ pratyayairbhāvavarjitam / niṣṭhābhāvaparaṃ brahma etāṃ mātrāṃ vadāmyaham // Lank_ 1 0 . 4 8 0 //
line.right: hyātmā dravyaḥ sa hi na vidyate / skandhānāṃ skandhatā tadvatprajñaptyā na tu dravyataḥ // Lank_ 1 0 . 4 8 1 // caturvidhā vai samatā lakṣaṇaṃ

line.left: / niṣṭhābhāvaparaṃ brahma etāṃ mātrāṃ vadāmyaham // Lank_ 1 0 . 4 8 0 // prajñaptisatyato hyātmā dravyaḥ sa hi na vidyate / skandhānāṃ skandhatā
line.right: na tu dravyataḥ // Lank_ 1 0 . 4 8 1 // caturvidhā vai samatā lakṣaṇaṃ hetubhājanam / nairātmyasamatā caiva caturthā yogayoginām // Lank_ 1 0 . 4 8 2

line.left: iti veditavyaṃ [ / ] [ 5 . Audārikasūkṣmatattva ] audārikasūkṣmatatvaṃ punaḥ saṃvṛtiparamārthasatyaṃ tan mūlatatve kathaṃ veditavyaṃ /
line.right: tathodbhāvanayodāraṃ / trividhā hi saṃvṛtiḥ prajñaptisaṃvṛtiḥ / pratipattisaṃvṛtiḥ / udbhāvanāsaṃvṛtiś ca / tayā saṃvṛtisatyatvaṃ

line.left: punaḥ saṃvṛtiparamārthasatyaṃ tan mūlatatve kathaṃ veditavyaṃ / prajñaptipratipattitas tathodbhāvanayodāraṃ / trividhā hi saṃvṛtiḥ
line.right: / pratipattisaṃvṛtiḥ / udbhāvanāsaṃvṛtiś ca / tayā saṃvṛtisatyatvaṃ mūlatatve yathākramaṃ veditavyaṃ / paramārthan tu ekataḥ // III . 1 0

line.left: parato niryāṇārthena pratyekabuddhayānaṃ / avikalpena jñānena svayaṃ niryāṇārthena mahāyānaṃ veditavyaṃ // [ j . Saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtārtha ]
line.right: / nimittāt praśamāt sārthāt paścimaṃ samudāhṛtaṃ // III . 22 saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtaṃ tatra saprajñaptir nāmakāyādayaḥ hetur bījasaṃgṛhītam

line.left: // [ j . Saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtārtha ] saprajñaptisahetukāt / nimittāt praśamāt sārthāt paścimaṃ samudāhṛtaṃ // III . 22 saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtaṃ tatra
line.right: nāmakāyādayaḥ hetur bījasaṃgṛhītam ālayavijñānaṃ / nimittaṃ pratiṣṭhādehabhogasaṃgṛhītaṃ / pravṛttivijñānasaṃgṛhītāś ca

line.left: bījasaṃgṛhītam ālayavijñānaṃ / nimittaṃ pratiṣṭhādehabhogasaṃgṛhītaṃ / pravṛttivijñānasaṃgṛhītāś ca manaudgrahavikalpaḥ / etat
line.right: nimittaṃ sasaṃprayogaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ veditavyaṃ / tatra mano yan nityaṃ manyanākāraṃ / udgrahaḥ pañcavijñānakāyāḥ vikalpo manovijñānaṃ ( / )

line.left: ca pratyanubhavati / satvāṃś ca paripācayati / uktā paramā pratipattiḥ / [ b . Manasikārapratipatti ] </page><page> manasikārapratipattiḥ katamā /
line.right: dharmamahāyānamanaskriyā / bodhisatvasya satataṃ prajñayā triprakārayā // V . 7 dānādīny adhikṛtya yathāprajñaptānāṃ sūtrādidharmāṇāṃ

line.left: katamā / yathāprajñaptito dharmamahāyānamanaskriyā / bodhisatvasya satataṃ prajñayā triprakārayā // V . 7 dānādīny adhikṛtya
line.right: sūtrādidharmāṇāṃ mahāyāne manasikaraṇam abhīkṣṇaṃ śrutacintābhāvanāmayyā prajñayā manasikārapratipattiḥ / sā triprakārayā prajñayā

line.left: madhyamā pratipad yā rūpādīnāṃ na nityapratyavekṣā nānityapratyavekṣā / ātmeti pudgalasamāropāntaḥ nairātmyam ity apavādāntaḥ
line.right: 'py apavādāt / tatparivarjanārthaṃ madhyamā pratipad yad ātmanairātmyayor madhyaṃ nirvikalpaṃ jñānaṃ / bhūtaṃ cittam iti

line.left: ca prativedhaḥ pratānatā / </page><page> pragamaḥ praśaṭhatvaṃ ca prakarṣālambanaṃ mataṃ // V . 2 8 ity etat / dvādaśavidham ālambanaṃ / yad uta
line.right: dharmadhātvālambanaṃ sādhyālambanaṃ sādhanālambanaṃ / dhāraṇālambanaṃ avadhāraṇālambanaṃ / pradhāraṇālambanaṃ /

line.left: / samāsatas trividham ānuttaryaṃ pratipattiḥ ( / ) pratipattyādhāraḥ pratipattiphalaṃ caiva / sā ca pratipattir yādṛśī paramā / yena ca
line.right: dharmamahāyānamanaskriyā ( V . 7 ab ) ity evamādinā / yathā yena prakāreṇāvikṣepapariṇatā ca śamathabhāvanayā aviparyāsapariṇatā ca

line.left: / prajñapyate ca śūnyena kathaṃ śūnyas tathāgataḥ // MMK_ 22 . 1 0 // śūnyam iti na vaktavyam aśūnyam iti vā bhavet / ubhayaṃ nobhayaṃ ceti
line.right: tu kathyate // MMK_ 22 . 11 // śāśvatāśāśvatādy atra kutaḥ śānte catuṣṭayam / antānantādi cāpy atra kutaḥ śānte catuṣṭayam // MMK_ 22 . 1 2 //

line.left: kartāraṃ karaṇaṃ kriyām / utpādaṃ ca nirodhaṃ ca phalaṃ ca pratibādhase // MMK_ 2 4 . 1 7 // yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatāṃ tāṃ pracakṣmahe / sā
line.right: upādāya pratipat saiva madhyamā // MMK_ 2 4 . 1 8 // apratītya samutpanno dharmaḥ kaścin na vidyate / yasmāt tasmād aśūnyo hi dharmaḥ kaścin na

line.left: vivādādhikaraṇādibhiḥ | abhigamyate sūtrārtha etenety abhidharmaḥ | āpatter utthānād vyutthānān niḥsṛteś ca vinayatvam | pudgalataḥ
line.right: pravibhāgaviniścayāc caiva || AMsa_ 11 . 4 || āpattitaḥ samutthānato vyutthānato niḥsaraṇataś ca veditavyaḥ | tatrāpattiḥ </page>

line.left: āśayato na daṇḍakarmataḥ | niḥsaraṇaṃ saptavidhaṃ | pratideśanā | abhyupagamaḥ śikṣādattakādīnāṃ daṇḍakarmaṇaḥ | samavadyotaḥ
line.right: śikṣāpade punaḥ paryāyeṇa | ajñānāt prasrabdhiḥ samagreṇa saṃghena śikṣāpadastha pratiprasrambhaṇāt | āśrayaparivṛttir

line.left: kṣudrānukṣudrāpannābhāve dharmapratilambhāt | punaś caturvidhenārthena vinayo veditavyaḥ | pudgalato yam āgamya śikṣā prajñapyate |
line.right: yadā 'rocite pudgalāparādhe śāstā saṃnipātya saṃghaśikṣāṃ prajñāpayati | pravibhāgato yaḥ prajñapte śikṣāpade tad uddeśasya vibhāgaḥ |

line.left: yam āgamya śikṣā prajñapyate | prajñaptito yadā 'rocite pudgalāparādhe śāstā saṃnipātya saṃghaśikṣāṃ prajñāpayati | pravibhāgato yaḥ
line.right: śikṣāpade tad uddeśasya vibhāgaḥ | viniścayataś ca tatrāpattiḥ kathaṃ bhavaty anāpattir veti nirdhāraṇāt | ālambanalābhaparyeṣṭau

line.left: pratipattinairyāṇikatvāt | anantā sarvaparapravādibhir anāchedyatvāt | kalā rañjikatvāt | vinītā rāgādipratipakṣatvāt | akarkaśā
line.right: | aparuṣā tadvyatikramasaṃpanniḥsaraṇopadeśakatvāt | suvinītā yānatrayanayopadeśikatvāt | karṇasukhā vikṣepapratipakṣatvāt |

line.left: evaṃ paryanuyogato 'pi kṣaṇikatvaṃ sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ prasiddhaṃ | pudgalanairātmyaprasādhanārthaṃ nairātmyavibhāge dvādaśa ślokaḥ |
line.right: vācyaḥ pudgalo dravyato na tu | nopalambhād viparyāsāt saṃkleśāt kliṣṭahetutaḥ || AMsa_ 1 8 . 9 2 || ekatvānyatvato vācyas tasmād doṣadvayād

line.left: 'nādikālikaḥ | ayatnamokṣaḥ sarveṣāṃ na mokṣaḥ pudgalo 'sti vā || AMsa_ 1 8 . 1 0 3 || pudgalaḥ kim astīti vaktavyo nāstīti vaktavyaḥ | āha |
line.right: vācyaḥ pudgalo dravyato na tu | yataś ca prajñaptito 'stīti vaktavyo dravyato nāstīti vaktavyaḥ | evam anekāṃśavādaparigrahe naivāstitve

line.left: 'sti vā || AMsa_ 1 8 . 1 0 3 || pudgalaḥ kim astīti vaktavyo nāstīti vaktavyaḥ | āha | prajñaptyastitayā vācyaḥ pudgalo dravyato na tu | yataś ca
line.right: 'stīti vaktavyo dravyato nāstīti vaktavyaḥ | evam anekāṃśavādaparigrahe naivāstitve doṣāvakāśo na nāstitve | sa punar dravyato nāstīti

line.left: caiṣa saṃkleśa iti kathaṃ veditavyaṃ | kliṣṭahetutaḥ | tathā hi tadhetukāḥ kliṣṭā </page><page> rāgādaya utpadyante | yatra punar vastuni rūpādisaṃjñake
line.right: pudgala iti tasmāt kim ekatvena pudgalo vaktavya āhosvid anyatvena | āha | ekatvānyatvato vācyas tasmād asau | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | doṣadvayāt |

line.left: | ekatve hi skandhānām ātmatvaṃ prasajyate pudgalasya ca dravyasatvaṃ | athānyatve pudgalsya dravyasatyaṃ | evaṃ hi pudgalsya
line.right: 'stitvād avaktavyatvaṃ yuktaḥ | tenāvyākṛtavastusiddhaḥ | ye punaḥ śāstuḥ śāsanam atikramya pudgalsya dravyato 'stitvam icchanti ta idaṃ

line.left: vyavadāne ca avasthāc chedabhinnake | vṛttisaṃtānabhedo hi pudgalenopadarśitaḥ || avasthābhinne hi saṃkleśavyavadāne chedabhinne ca |
line.right: antareṇa tadvṛttibhedaḥ saṃtānabhedaś ca deśayituṃ na śakyaḥ | parijñāsūtre parijñeyā dharmāḥ saṃkleśaḥ parijñā vyavadānaṃ |

line.left: vyavadānaṃ | bhārahārasūtre | bhāro bhārādānaṃ ca saṃkleśaḥ | bhāranikṣepaṇaṃ vyavadānaṃ | tayor vṛttibhedaḥ saṃtānabhedaś cāntareṇa
line.right: na śakyeta deśayituṃ | bodhipakṣāś ca dharmā bahudhāvasthāḥ prayogadarśanabhāvanāniṣṭhāmārgaviśeṣabhedataḥ | teṣāṃ vṛttibhedaḥ

line.left: | bodhipakṣāś ca dharmā bahudhāvasthāḥ prayogadarśanabhāvanāniṣṭhāmārgaviśeṣabhedataḥ | teṣāṃ vṛttibhedaḥ saṃtānabhedaś cāntareṇa
line.right: na śakyeta deśayituṃ | yenāsati dravyato 'stitve pudgalo deśita ity ayam atra nayo veditavyaḥ | itarathā hi pudgaladeśanā niṣprayojanā

line.left: ṣaḍvidhaṃ pradhānaṃ | tatra śīlaviśuddhir āryakāntaṃ śīlaṃ | antyā sakaruṇā sthitiś caturthaṃ karuṇā 'pramāṇayuktaṃ | śeṣaṃ gatārthaṃ |
line.right: catvāraḥ ślokaḥ | vidyāsthānavyavasthānaṃ sūtrādyākārabhedataḥ | jñeyaṃ dharmavyavasthānaṃ dhīmatāṃ sarvabhūmiṣu || AMsa_ 1 9 . 4 3 ||

line.left: || AMsa_ 1 9 . 4 5 || āśayād deśanāc caiva prayogāt saṃbhṛter api | samudāgamabhedāc ca trividhaṃ yānam iṣyate || AMsa_ 1 9 . 4 6 || caturvidhaṃ
line.right: | dharmasatyayuktiyānaprajñaptivyavasthānabhedāt | tatra </page><page> pañcavidyāsthānavyavasthānaṃ dharmavyavasthānaṃ veditavyaṃ

line.left: deśanāc caiva prayogāt saṃbhṛter api | samudāgamabhedāc ca trividhaṃ yānam iṣyate || AMsa_ 1 9 . 4 6 || caturvidhaṃ prajñaptivyavasthānaṃ |
line.right: | tatra </page><page> pañcavidyāsthānavyavasthānaṃ dharmavyavasthānaṃ veditavyaṃ sūtrageyādibhir ākārabhedaiḥ | tadantarbhūtāny eva tadanyāni

line.left: pravṛttitathatāṃ lakṣaṇatathatāṃ vijñaptitathatāṃ saṃniveśatathatāṃ mithyāpratipattitathatāṃ samyakpratipattitathatāṃ ca |
line.right: caturvidhaṃ | apekṣāyuktiḥ | kāryakāraṇayuktiḥ | upapattisādhanayuktiḥ | dharmatāyuktiś ca | yānaprajñaptivyavasthānaṃ trividhaṃ |

line.left: ca | yuktiprajñaptivyavasthānaṃ caturvidhaṃ | apekṣāyuktiḥ | kāryakāraṇayuktiḥ | upapattisādhanayuktiḥ | dharmatāyuktiś ca |
line.right: trividhaṃ | śrāvakayānaṃ | pratyekabuddhayānaṃ | mahāyānaṃ | tatrāpekṣāyuktis triṣv api yāneṣu yoniśomanaskāraḥ | tam apekṣya tena

line.left: yathāprayogaṃ saṃbhāraḥ | yathāsaṃbhāraṃ ca bodhisamudāgama iti | paryeṣaṇāvibhāge ślokaḥ | āgantukatvaparyeṣā anyonyaṃ nāma vastunoḥ |
line.right: dvividhasyātra tanmātratvasya vaiṣaṇā || AMsa_ 1 9 . 4 7 || caturvidhā paryeṣaṇā dharmāṇāṃ | nāmaparyṣaṇā vastuparyeṣaṇā |

line.left: | prajñapter dvividhasyātra tanmātratvasya vaiṣaṇā || AMsa_ 1 9 . 4 7 || caturvidhā paryeṣaṇā dharmāṇāṃ | nāmaparyṣaṇā vastuparyeṣaṇā |
line.right: | viśeṣaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇā ca | tatra nāmno vastuny āgantukatvaparyeṣaṇā nāmaparyeṣaṇā veditavyā | vastuno nāmny āgantukatvaparyeṣaṇā

line.left: tanmātratvasya vaiṣaṇā || AMsa_ 1 9 . 4 7 || caturvidhā paryeṣaṇā dharmāṇāṃ | nāmaparyṣaṇā vastuparyeṣaṇā | svabhāvaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇā |
line.right: ca | tatra nāmno vastuny āgantukatvaparyeṣaṇā nāmaparyeṣaṇā veditavyā | vastuno nāmny āgantukatvaparyeṣaṇā vastuparyeṣaṇā veditavyā |

line.left: āgantukatvaparyeṣaṇā nāmaparyeṣaṇā veditavyā | vastuno nāmny āgantukatvaparyeṣaṇā vastuparyeṣaṇā veditavyā | tadubhayābhisaṃbandhe
line.right: prajñaptimātratvaparyeṣaṇā svabhāvaviśeṣaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇā veditavyā | yathābhūtaparihāravibhāge daśa ślokaḥ |

line.left: veditavyā | vastuno nāmny āgantukatvaparyeṣaṇā vastuparyeṣaṇā veditavyā | tadubhayābhisaṃbandhe svabhāvaviśeṣaprajñaptyoḥ
line.right: svabhāvaviśeṣaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇā veditavyā | yathābhūtaparihāravibhāge daśa ślokaḥ | sarvasyānupalambhāc ca bhūtajñānaṃ

line.left: āgantukatvaparyeṣaṇā vastuparyeṣaṇā veditavyā | tadubhayābhisaṃbandhe svabhāvaviśeṣaprajñaptyoḥ prajñaptimātratvaparyeṣaṇā
line.right: veditavyā | yathābhūtaparihāravibhāge daśa ślokaḥ | sarvasyānupalambhāc ca bhūtajñānaṃ caturvidhaṃ | sarvārthasiddhyai dhīrāṇāṃ

line.left: dhīrāṇāṃ sarvabhūmiṣu jāyate || AMsa_ 1 9 . 4 8 || caturvidhaṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ dharmāṇāṃ nāmaparyeṣaṇāgatam | vastuparyeṣaṇāgataṃ |
line.right: | viśeṣaparjñaptiparyeṣaṇāgataṃ ca | tac ca sarvasyāsya </page><page> nāmādikasyānupalambhād veditavyaṃ | uttarārdhena yathābhūtaparijñānasya

line.left: saptānāṃ ratnānāmaṣṭāpadanibaddhaṃ toraṇasaptapratimaṇḍitam / tatra caikaḥ prāsādaḥ kārito 'bhūt , yatra catasraḥ śayanakoṭyaḥ
line.right: paribhogārtham / tatra ca madhye udyānaṃ māpitamabhūtsarvapuṣpavṛkṣasarvaphalavṛkṣasarvaratnavṛkṣapratisphuṭaṃ

line.left: upariratnajālasaṃchāditābhūt , mā kumārasya rajo pāṃśurvā śarīre nipatiṣyatīti // tena ca samayena tasmin prāsāde catasra āsanakoṭyaḥ
line.right: abhūvan saptaratnamayyaḥ / sarvasmiṃścāsane pañca pañca dūṣyaśatāni prajñptānyabhūvan / tatra ca madhye āsanaṃ prajñaptaṃ

line.left: āsanakoṭyaḥ prajñaptā abhūvan saptaratnamayyaḥ / sarvasmiṃścāsane pañca pañca dūṣyaśatāni prajñptānyabhūvan / tatra ca madhye āsanaṃ
line.right: saptaratnamayaṃ saptapauruṣamuccatvena aśītidūṣyakoṭibhiḥ prajñaptam , yatra puṇyaraśmī rājakumāro </page><page> niṣetsyata iti / sarvatra

line.left: pañca dūṣyaśatāni prajñptānyabhūvan / tatra ca madhye āsanaṃ prajñaptaṃ saptaratnamayaṃ saptapauruṣamuccatvena aśītidūṣyakoṭibhiḥ
line.right: , yatra puṇyaraśmī rājakumāro </page><page> niṣetsyata iti / sarvatra cāsanamūle agarugandhaghaṭikā dhūpyate / triṣkṛtvo divasasya triṣkṛtvo rātreḥ

line.left: taṃ tathāgataṃ pratipādayati sma sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena / sarveṣāṃ teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ saptaratnacitān vihārān kārayāmāsa maṇicaṃkramān
line.right: ca ratnajālavitānavitatān vāmadakṣiṇena puṣpavṛkṣasupariniṣṭhitān / puṇḍarīkapuṣkariṇyupaśibhitānyubhayato

line.left: prajñaptānupari ca ratnajālavitānavitatān vāmadakṣiṇena puṣpavṛkṣasupariniṣṭhitān / puṇḍarīkapuṣkariṇyupaśibhitānyubhayato
line.right: </page><page> śayyāsanāni / ekaikasya ca bhikṣorabhivandya cīvaro dīyate sma ekaikaḥ / anyonyāni cīvarāṇyanipradīyante divase divase / sa

line.left: udayaṃ paśyan nāstitām ativartate | astitām api nopaiti nirodhaṃ saha hetunā || RATNA_ 0 1 . 4 6 prāgjātaḥ sahajātaś ca hetur ahetuko 'rthataḥ |
line.right: apratītatvād utpatteś caiva tattvataḥ || RATNA_ 0 1 . 4 7 asmin satīdaṃ bhavati dīrghe hrasvaṃ yathā sati | [ tasyotpādād udetīdaṃ dīpotpādād

line.left: / kāruṇyamutpādya paraṃ pareṣu sa śīlavāṃstatpratirūpako 'nya iti // tatra kenārthena kimadhikṛtya bhagavatā śaraṇatrayaṃ
line.right: // śāstṛśāsanaśiṣyārthairadhikṛtya triyānikān / kāratrayādhimuktāṃśca prajñaptaṃ śaraṇatrayam // 19 // </page><page> buddhaḥ śaraṇamagryatvād

line.left: kenārthena kimadhikṛtya bhagavatā śaraṇatrayaṃ prajñaptam // śāstṛśāsanaśiṣyārthairadhikṛtya triyānikān / kāratrayādhimuktāṃśca
line.right: śaraṇatrayam // 19 // </page><page> buddhaḥ śaraṇamagryatvād dvipadānāmiti śāstṛguṇodbhāvanārthena buddhabhāvāyopagatān bodhisattvān pudgalān

line.left: śāstṛguṇodbhāvanārthena buddhabhāvāyopagatān bodhisattvān pudgalān buddhe ca paramakārakriyādhimuktānadhikṛtya deśitaṃ
line.right: / dharmaḥ śaraṇamagryatvādvirāgāṇāmiti śāstṛḥ śāsana guṇodbhāvanārthena svayaṃ pratītya gambhīradharmānubodhāyopagatān

line.left: pratītya gambhīradharmānubodhāyopagatān pratyekabuddhayānikān pudgalān dharme ca paramakārakriyādhimuktānadhikṛtya deśitaṃ
line.right: / saṃghaḥ śaraṇamagryatvādgaṇānāmiti śāstuḥ śāsane supratipannaśiṣyaguṇodbhāvanārthena parataḥ śravaghoṣasyānugamāyopagatān

line.left: parataḥ śravaghoṣasyānugamāyopagatān śrāvakayānikān pudgalān saṃghe ca paramakārākriyādhimuktānadhikṛtya deśitaṃ
line.right: / ityanena samāsatastrividhenārthena ṣaṭ pudgalānadhikṛtya prabhedayo bhagavatā saṃvṛtipadasthānena

line.left: ṣaṭ pudgalānadhikṛtya prabhedayo bhagavatā saṃvṛtipadasthānena sattvānāmanupūrvanayāvatārārthamimāni trīṇi śaraṇāni deśitāni
line.right: / tyājyatvān moṣadharmatvādabhāvāt sabhayatvataḥ / dharmo dvidhāryasaṃghaśca nātyantaṃ śaraṇaṃ param // 20 // dvividho dharmaḥ /

line.left: nirvāṇādhigamo 'pi ca // tatra kathamanādikālikaḥ / yattathāgatagarbhamevādhikṛtya bhagavatā pūrva koṭirna prajñāyata iti deśitaṃ
line.right: / dhāturiti / yadāha / yo 'yaṃ bhagavaṃstathāgatagarbho </page><page> lokottaragarbhaḥ prakṛtipariśuddhagarbha iti / sarvadharmasamāśraya iti /

line.right: | saṃskāreṣu nirvedaḥ | satkāreṣvanabhilāṣaḥ | asatkāreṣūpekṣā | lābhe 'narthikatā | alābhe 'navalīnatā | yaśasyanabhilāṣaḥ |

line.left: durvijñeyānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ parebhyaḥ saṃprakāśanatā || .... nāmasaṃketaḥ ? yadidaṃ apariniṣpannānāṃ nāmnāmanubudhyanatā || ....

line.left: || .... nāmasaṃketaḥ ? yadidaṃ apariniṣpannānāṃ nāmnāmanubudhyanatā || .... prajñaptivyavahāraḥ ? yadidaṃ lokavyavahāraḥ || ....
line.right: ? yadidaṃ pravyāhārajñānam || .... saṃsāranivṛttiḥ ? yadidaṃ saṃsāradoṣapratyavekṣā || .... lābhānarthikatā ? yadidaṃ bhūtālpecchatā ||

line.left: || durvijñeyaṃ śāriputra saṃdhābhāṣyaṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām | tatkasya hetoḥ ? svapratyayān dharmān prakāśayanti
line.right: sattvān pramocayitum | mahopāyakauśalyajñānadarśanaparamapāramitāprāptāḥ śāriputra tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ |

line.left: bhaviṣyanti | tadanenāpi śāriputra paryāyeṇa evaṃ veditavyaṃ yathā nāsti dvitīyasya yānasya kvaciddaśasu dikṣu loke
line.right: , kutaḥ punastṛtīyasya || api tu khalu punaḥ śāriputra yadā tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā kalpakaṣāye </page><page> votpadyante sattvakaṣāye vā

line.left: bhagavantametadavocat - yadi bhagavan na santi trīṇi yānāni , kiṃ kāraṇaṃ pratyutpanne 'dhvani śrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ
line.right: prajñapyate ? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ mahākāśyapametadavocat - tadyathā kāśyapa kumbhakāraḥ samāsu mṛttikāsu bhājanāni karoti |

line.left: te dharmā āmukhībhavanti sma || tasya khalu punarbhikṣavo bhagavato bodhimaṇḍavarāgragatasya devaistrāyastriṃśairmahāsiṃhāsanaṃ
line.right: yojanaśatasahasraṃ samucchrayeṇa , yatra sa bhagavān niṣadya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ | samanantaraniṣaṇṇasya ca

line.left: samādhervyuttiṣṭhat | vyutthāya ca sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato yena taddharmāsanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmat | upasaṃkramya
line.right: evāsane nyaṣīdat | samanantaraniṣaṇṇaśca khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgatastasmin dharmāsane , atha

line.left: anupūrvaśākhāpatrapalāśapariṇāhaḥ puṣpaphalapratimaṇḍitaḥ | ekaikasmiṃśca ratnavṛkṣamūle siṃhāsanaṃ
line.right: pañcayojanaśatānyuccaistvena mahāratnapratimaṇḍitam | tasminnekaikastathāgataḥ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā niṣaṇṇo 'bhūt | anena paryāyeṇa

line.left: | sarvasmiṃśca ratnavṛkṣamūle pañcayojanaśatānyārohapariṇāhaṃ divyaratnamayaṃ vicitraṃ darśanīyaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ
line.right: | teṣu ratnavṛkṣamūleṣvāgatāgatāstathāgatāḥ siṃhāsaneṣu paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā niṣīdante sma | anena paryāyeṇa punaraparāṇi

line.left: eva tasya bhagavata āyuṣpramāṇam aparyantam . tena sa tathāgato 'mitāyur ity ucyate . yathā cānandeha lokadhātau kalpasaṃkhyā kalpagaṇanā
line.right: , tathā sāṃprataṃ daśakalpās tasya bhagavato 'mitāyuṣas tathāgatasyotpannasyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim </page><page> abhisaṃbuddhasya . tasya khalu

line.left: bhikṣuḥ . tasmiṃś cānanda buddhakṣetre sarvaśo 'gnicandrasūrya- grahanakṣatratārārūpānāṃ tamo'ndhakārasya ca nāmadheya-
line.right: api nāsti . sarvaśo rātridivaprajñaptir api nāsty , anyatra tathāgatavyavahārāt . sarvaśaś cāgāraparigraha- saṃjñā nāsti . tasyāṃ khalu

line.left: cānanda buddhakṣetre sarvaśo 'gnicandrasūrya- grahanakṣatratārārūpānāṃ tamo'ndhakārasya ca nāmadheya- prajñaptir api nāsti . sarvaśo
line.right: api nāsty , anyatra tathāgatavyavahārāt . sarvaśaś cāgāraparigraha- saṃjñā nāsti . tasyāṃ khalu punar ānanda sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau kāle

line.left: upapannā utpadyanta upapatsyante , sarve te niyatāḥ samyaktve yāvan nirvāṇāt . tat kasya hetoḥ . nāsti tatra dvayo rāśyor vyavasthānaṃ
line.right: vā , yad idam : aniyatyasya vā mithyātvaniyatasya vā . tad anenāpy ānanda paryāyeṇa sā lokadhātuḥ sukhāvatīty ucyate saṃkṣiptena , na

line.right: dharmaprajñaptiś ca | vividha ity anekaprakāraḥ | ātmā jīvo jantur manujo māṇava ity evamādika ātmopacāraḥ skandhā dhātava āyatanāni rūpaṃ

line.left: | vijñānapariṇāme 'sau | 1 c ātmadharmopacāra iti saṃbadhyate | ātmā dharmāś copacaryanta ity ātmadharmopacāraḥ | sa punar ātmaprajñaptir
line.right: ca | vividha ity anekaprakāraḥ | ātmā jīvo jantur manujo māṇava ity evamādika ātmopacāraḥ skandhā dhātava āyatanāni rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā

line.left: vartamānam apakāram āgamya yaś cetasa āghātaḥ | ayaṃ cāghātasvarūpatvāt pratighān na bhidyate | kiṃ tv asya pratighasyāvasthāviśeṣe
line.right: pratighāṃśikaḥ | vartamānam apakāram āgamya yaś cetasa āghātaḥ sattvāsattvaviṣayo daṇḍadānādisaṃniśrayadānakarmakaś ca sa krodha iti

line.left: | akṣāntir apakārāmarṣaṇaṃ pratyapakāracikīrṣā ca | ayam api krodhavat pradveṣāvasthāviśeṣe prajñapyate | ataḥ
line.right: eva veditavyaḥ | mrakṣa ātmano 'vadyapracchādanā | chandadveṣabhayādīn nirākṛtya kāle taddhitaiṣiṇā codakena tat tvam evaṃkārīty

line.left: arthasyānyathā prakāśanā | iyañ ca sahitābhyāṃ rāgamohābhyām abhūtān guṇān prakāśayatas tayoḥ samuditayoḥ prajñapyata iti krodhādivat
line.right: eva na dravyata iti mithyājīvasaṃniśrayadānakarmikā | </page><page> śāṭhyaṃ svadoṣapracchādanopāyasaṃgṛhītañ cetasaḥ kauṭilyam |

line.left: cittaṃ jaḍībhavati stimitaṃ bhavati nālambanaṃ pratipattuṃ samutsahate | etac ca sarvakleśopakleśasahāyyadānakarmakam | mohāṃśe
line.right: ca mohāṃśikam eva na pṛthag vidyate | auddhatyaṃ cittasyāvyupaśamaḥ | vyupaśamo hi śamathas tadviruddho 'vyupaśamaḥ | sa punar eṣa

line.left: cetanāyāś cittaparispandātmakatvāt prajñāyāś ca guṇadoṣavivekākāratvāt | tadvaśena cittapravṛtteḥ kadācic cittacetanayor vitarkaḥ
line.right: kadācit prajñācetasor yathākramam anabhyūhābhyuhāvasthayoḥ | atha vā cetanāprajñayor eva vitarkaḥ prajñaptis tadvaśena cittasya

line.left: cittacetanayor vitarkaḥ prajñaptiḥ kadācit prajñācetasor yathākramam anabhyūhābhyuhāvasthayoḥ | atha vā cetanāprajñayor eva vitarkaḥ
line.right: tadvaśena cittasya tathāpravṛttatvāt | sa eva cittasyaudārikatā | audārikateti sthūlatā vastumātraparyeṣaṇākāratvāt | </page><page> eṣa ca nayo

line.left: kulaputra bodhisatvena tr̥ṇasaṃstare atha tair api caturaśītyā devaputrasahasaiḥ caturaśītiḥ siṃhāsanasahasrāni bodhisatvam udriśya
line.right: citrāṇi darśanīyāni uccāni pragr̥hītāni sarvaratnapratyuptāni ratnavedikāprahītāni ratnajālasaṃsthannāni kiṃkiṇījālāvanaddhāni |

line.left: pragr̥hītāni sarvaratnapratyuptāni ratnavedikāprahītāni ratnajālasaṃsthannāni kiṃkiṇījālāvanaddhāni | muktāhārapralaṃbitāni
line.right: | tatra kulaputra bodhisatvena sarveṣu teṣu siṃhāsaneṣu niṣaṇṇaḥ || </page><page> atmā upadarśito bhūt | na ca te devaputrā anyonyaṃ paśyanti sma | na tu

line.left: bhagavatādhivāsitaṃ dharmacakrapravarttanāya tadā śikhinā brahmaṇā vārāṇasyām r̥ṣipatane mr̥gadāve bhagavantam uddiśya siṃhāsanaṃ
line.right: abhūt dvācatvāriṃśad yojanasahasrāṇy uccaistvena sarvākāravaropetaṃ citraṃ darśanīyaṃ dharaṇitalāpratiṣṭitaṃ yathā ca śikhinā

line.left: uccaistvena sarvākāravaropetaṃ citraṃ darśanīyaṃ dharaṇitalāpratiṣṭitaṃ yathā ca śikhinā brahmanā tathāgatam uddiśya siṃhāsaṃnaṃ
line.right: abhūt tathā daśabhir brahmakoṭībhiḥ śakrakoṭibhiḥ daśabhir bodhisatvanayutaiḥ saparivāraiḥ tathāgatam uddiśya siṃhāsanāni

line.left: bhagavantam evam āha | anena kuśalamūlena sarvasatvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisampadyante | atha rājñā ajitasenena āsanāni
line.right: | tasya bhagavataḥ siṃhāsanaṃ pradattam * | atha bhagavān siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇo rājño 'jitasenasya dharmān deśitavān * | atha rājñā ajitasenena

line.left: samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā | yat khalu punaḥ subhūte syād evaṃ bodhisatvayānasaṃprasthitaiḥ kasyacid dharmasya vināśaḥ
line.right: ucchedo vā na khalu punaḥ subhūte evaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ | na bodhisatvayānasaṃprasthitaiḥ kasyacid dharmasya vināśaḥ prajñapto nocchedaḥ yaś ca

line.left: vināśaḥ prajñapta ucchedo vā na khalu punaḥ subhūte evaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ | na bodhisatvayānasaṃprasthitaiḥ kasyacid dharmasya vināśaḥ
line.right: nocchedaḥ yaś ca khalu punaḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātūn saptaratnapratipūrṇān kṛtvā
